import React, { useEffect, useState, useContext } from 'react' import { Flex, Icon, Image, Box, Badge } from '@chakra-ui/react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { ShopContext } from '../context/ShopContext'; import { MdMenu, MdShoppingCart } from 'react-icons/md' const Header = () => { const width = window.innerWidth //console.log(width) const [time, setTime] = useState(new Date().toLocaleTimeString()); useEffect(() => { const timeout = setTimeout(() => { const date = new Date() setTime(date.toLocaleTimeString('en-US', { hour12: true })); }, 1000); }, [time]); const { openCart, openMenu, checkout } = useContext(ShopContext) return ( <>
{/*
HD by REACT{time}
  • Home
  • About
  • Portfolio
  • Shop
  • Blog
  • Contact
    • {width < 767 ?
  • openCart()} fill="#fff" cursor="pointer" as={MdShoppingCart} w={30} h={30}> {checkout.lineItems?.length}
    • :
  • openCart()} fill="#fff" cursor="pointer" as={MdShoppingCart} w={30} h={30}> {checkout.lineItems?.length}
    • }
*/}
HD by REACT{time}
  • Home
  • About
  • Portfolio
  • Shop
  • Blog
  • Contact
    • {width < 767 ?
  • openCart()} fill="#fff" cursor="pointer" as={MdShoppingCart} w={30} h={30}> {checkout.lineItems?.length}
    • :
  • openCart()} fill="#fff" cursor="pointer" as={MdShoppingCart} w={30} h={30}> {checkout.lineItems?.length}
    • }
) } export default Header
